title: DaveF
author: DaveF
created_time: October 25, 2023, 07:35:10 PMLast edit: February 05, 2024, 07:45:16 PM by DaveF
content: Fan in the case sucks. I think it's #3 or #4 I had to replace so many of them.m.2 SATA only will not take an m.2 NVMeNo SD card. No Drive. Â No power supply. No support. US shipping only.Payment address: bc1qdufcfvlqtuhed84qrs4lfrhfla2ryw6jzljezuIf you have any questions ask.-Dave

comments.author: DaveF
comments.body: Bump since it's been a while.Am I asking too much?Just nobody interested?Don't want to pay with BTC because of the fees and want to use another coin?If no takers I'll probably just put it back into use. But really wanted to clear some things out of here.-Dave

comments.author: Papillion
comments.body: hey, that's a really neat project. I'd buy this if it was in my price range...either the white case or finally just putting it in the maroonish area.

comments.body: Quote from: WhyFhy on November 24, 2023, 01:42:28 PMWhat's your Black Friday special shipped to 76655It would be more of a Cyber Monday thing, but how about 10% off so $63.Can do LTC / doge if you don't want to deal with the BTC fees at the moment.-Dave
